name: research-feed-aggregator
description: RSS feed aggregator with full-text search capabilities

scripts.setup: npm run worker:setup && npm run frontend:setup
scripts.frontend:deploy: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.deploy: npm run worker:deploy && npm run frontend:deploy
scripts.dev:mock: concurrently "node mock-server.js" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run worker:deploy && cd frontend && npm run build

author: Research Feed Team
